snippet: The location of the operations center from which the Pentagon coordinated all missions in the Iraqi and Afghan wars was revealed when the defense secretary paid a very public visit.
abstract: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel’s visit to the advanced air operations center in Qatar is not just a stop at an important outpost of the United States military, it is also a major step forward for Pentagon transparency; Pentagon officials say the of the defense secretary’s visit to highly classified facility and week of travels is to prove to Persian Gulf partners that the United States would remain engaged in the region.
lead_paragraph: The location of the operations center from which the Pentagon coordinated all missions in the Iraqi and Afghan wars was revealed when the defense secretary paid a very public visit.
